content: Our vision is centered on five key pillars: number one creating great content and franchises across land-based, digital and mobile, as we look to increase share and drive our organic growth; number two, expanding in high-growth digital markets, growing our recurring revenues and fueling our high-quality earnings and cash generation; number three, enabling a seamless player experience through our leading platforms in an increasingly converging gaming industry; number four, delevering and maximizing cash, to fuel investment and shareholder returns; number five, fostering a high-performance culture, as we cultivate the best talent in the business.
